creator: Matteo Cappello
descriptionHtml:
TWTools stands for "True Wireless Tools". It's a simple tool that let you check the correct battery status of i500 TWS pods, original AirPods, AirPods Pro and other clones.

A notification appear when pods are connected let you check realtime battery status.

TWTools let you rename your pods like on iOS device.

☆ Functionality ☆
✓ Correct Battery Level on TWS pods and step 10% battery level on original AirPods and AirPods Pro with realtime info.
✓ Persistent Battery Level Notification.
✓ Pods local renaming (on Android pods renaming works only on local device and not persistent on pods like on iOS devices).

☆ Compatibility ☆
✓ i500 TWS & clones
✓ AirPods & AirPods Pro

☆ Important Notes ☆
To read battery status of pods after the installation of this app: place pods inside case, open TWTools and open pods case. Battery level appear on screen.
To work properly, TWTools needs to disable system battery optimization for it, let it to run in background.

☆ Translation ☆
Do you want TWTools in your language? Help me to translate it! Contact me at twtools@matteocappello.com

☆ Permissions ☆
✓ BLUETOOTH to scan devices and get battery levels.
✓ GPS to scan BL LOW ENERGY devices and use Bluetooth functions (Android policy).
descriptionShort: Tools for true wireless i500 TWS, AirPods, AirPods Pro and other clones.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improved battery status checking, now works until pods are connected with realtime battery level changes. This improvement may not work correctly on some devices but basic battery check function is not compromise.
Notification dismiss when pods are disconnected from device.
Original AirPods and AirPods Pro are fully compatible.
Added rename function of pods like on iOS device. Pods renaming works on only local device (not such iOS pods renaming) and may not compatible with some Android devices.

title: TWTools - True Wireless Tools

creator: Matteo Cappello
descriptionHtml:
TWTools stands for "True Wireless Tools". It's a simple tool that let you check the correct battery status of i500 TWS pods, original AirPods, AirPods Pro and other clones.

A notification appear when pods are connected let you check realtime battery status.

TWTools let you rename your pods like on iOS device.

☆ Functionality ☆

✓ Persistent Battery Level Notification.
✓ Pods local renaming (on Android pods renaming works only on local device and not persistent on pods like on iOS devices).

☆ Compatibility ☆
✓ i500 TWS & clones
✓ AirPods & AirPods Pro

☆ Important Notes ☆
To read battery status of pods after the installation of this app: place pods inside case, open TWTools and open pods case. Battery level appear on screen.
To work properly, TWTools needs to disable system battery optimization for it, let it to run in background.

☆ Translation ☆
Do you want TWTools in your language? Help me to translate it! Contact me at twtools@matteocappello.com

☆ Permissions ☆

descriptionShort: Tools for true wireless i500 TWS, AirPods, AirPods Pro and other clones.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fixed Android 10 permission problems.
To work correctly on Android 10, grant always background location permission on application start.

title: TWTools - True Wireless Tools

creator: Matteo Cappello
descriptionHtml:
TWTools stands for "True Wireless Tools". It's a simple tool that let you check the correct battery status of i500 TWS pods, original AirPods, AirPods Pro and other clones.

A notification or a popup window appear when pods are connected let you check realtime battery status.

TWTools let you rename your pods like on iOS device.

☆ Functionality ☆
✓ Correct Battery Level on TWS pods and step 10% battery level on original AirPods and AirPods Pro with realtime info.
✓ Persistent Battery Level Notification.
✓ Popup window with battery level when pods case opened.
✓ Pods local renaming (on Android pods renaming works only on local device and not persistent on pods like on iOS devices).

☆ Compatibility ☆
✓ i500 TWS & clones
✓ AirPods & AirPods Pro
✓ i50000 TWS (reported by users)
✓ HOCO ES20 PLUS (reported by users)
✓ JOYROOM JR-T03S (reported by users)
Important note: models reported by users are not ufficially confirmed.

☆ Important Notes ☆
To read battery status of pods after the installation of this app: place pods inside case, open TWTools and open pods case. Battery level appear on screen.
To work properly, TWTools needs to disable system battery optimization for it, let it to run in background.

☆ Translation ☆
Do you want TWTools in your language? Help me to translate it! Contact me at twtools@matteocappello.com

☆ Permissions ☆
✓ BLUETOOTH to scan devices and get battery levels.
✓ GPS to scan BL LOW ENERGY devices and use Bluetooth functions (Android policy).
✓ SYSTEM ALERT WINDOW to show popup window over the screen.
Important note: on Android 10 you have to grant ALWAYS background location permission to let TWTools check when pods are connected and show notification.
descriptionShort: Tools for true wireless i500 TWS, AirPods, AirPods Pro and other clones.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Added popup window iOS style when pods case opened. To enable this popup you have to grant overlay permission.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improved GUI and functionality.
Added "Connection Type" spinner.
Fixed permissions problem on older Android versions.

Popup and Notification can enabled together now.

title: TWTools - True Wireless Tools

creator: Matteo Cappello
descriptionHtml:
TWTools stands for "True Wireless Tools". It's a simple tool that let you check the correct battery status of i500 TWS pods, original AirPods, AirPods Pro and other clones.

☆ PLEASE READ ALL THE DESCRIPTION ☆

A notification or a popup window appear when pods are connected let you check realtime battery status.

TWTools let you rename your pods like on iOS device.

☆ Functionality ☆
✓ Correct Battery Level on TWS pods and step 10% battery level on original AirPods and AirPods Pro with realtime info.
✓ Persistent Battery Level Notification.
✓ Popup window with battery level when pods case opened.
✓ Pods local renaming (on Android pods renaming works only on local device and not persistent on pods like on iOS devices).
✓ Dark Mode.

☆ Compatibility ☆
✓ i500 TWS & clones
✓ AirPods & AirPods Pro
✓ i50000 TWS (reported by users)
✓ HOCO ES20 PLUS (reported by users)
✓ JOYROOM JR-T03S (reported by users)
✓ JOYROOM JR-TP1 (Universal mode, reported by users)
✓ Inpods 13 PRO (reported by users)
✓ Baseus S1Pro (reported by users)
✓ Lenovo LP6 (reported by users)
Important note: models reported by users are not ufficially confirmed.

☆ Important Notes ☆
To read battery status of pods after the installation of this app: place pods inside case, open TWTools and open pods case. Battery level appear on screen.
To work properly, TWTools needs to disable system battery optimization for it, let it to run in background.

☆ Samsung Users ☆
With OneUI on Samsung, TWTools needs to be added to whitelist of not suspended apps to work correctly. TWTools don't do it automatically.

☆ Android 12 Users ☆
On Android 12 TWTools doesn't need location permission to scan devices but you have to grant new Bluetooth permission.

☆ Translation ☆
Do you want TWTools in your language? Help me to translate it! Contact me at twtools@matteocappello.com

☆ Permissions ☆
✓ BLUETOOTH to scan devices and get battery levels.
✓ GPS to scan BL LOW ENERGY devices and use Bluetooth functions (Android 11 and below policy).
✓ SYSTEM ALERT WINDOW to show popup window over the screen.
Important note: on Android 10+ you have to grant ALWAYS background location permission to let TWTools check when pods are connected and show notification.
descriptionShort: Tools for true wireless i500 TWS, AirPods, AirPods Pro and other clones.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added Android 12 support.
Improved devices compatibility and various bug fix.

Do you want TWTools in your language? Help me to translate it! Contact me at twtools@matteocappello.com

☆ Permissions ☆
✓ BLUETOOTH to scan devices and get battery levels.
✓ GPS to scan BL LOW ENERGY devices and use Bluetooth functions (Android 11 and below policy).
✓ SYSTEM ALERT WINDOW to show popup window over the screen.
Important note: on Android 10+ you have to grant ALWAYS background location permission to let TWTools check when pods are connected and show notification.
descriptionShort: Tools for true wireless i500 TWS, AirPods, Beats and other clones.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added support for Android 13.
Added support for AirPods 3 and AirPods Pro Gen 2.
Improved bluetooth scanning management.

title: TWTools - True Wireless Tools

creator: Matteo Cappello
descriptionHtml:
TWTools stands for "True Wireless Tools". It's a simple tool that let you check the correct battery status of i500 TWS pods, original AirPods, AirPods Pro, AirPods Max, Beats and other clones.

☆ PLEASE READ ALL THE DESCRIPTION ☆

A notification or a popup window appear when pods are connected let you check realtime battery status.

TWTools let you rename your pods like on iOS device.

☆ Functionality ☆
✓ Correct Battery Level on TWS pods and step 10% battery level on original AirPods, AirPods Pro, AirPods Max and Beats with realtime info.
✓ Persistent Battery Level Notification.
✓ Popup window with battery level when pods case opened.
✓ Pods local renaming (on Android pods renaming works only on local device and not persistent on pods like on iOS devices).
✓ Dark Mode.

☆ Compatibility ☆
✓ i500 TWS & clones
✓ AirPods, AirPods Pro, AirPods Max and Beats
✓ i50000 TWS (reported by users)
✓ HOCO ES20 PLUS (reported by users)
✓ JOYROOM JR-T03S (reported by users)
✓ JOYROOM JR-TP1 (Universal mode, reported by users)
✓ Inpods 13 PRO (reported by users)
✓ Baseus S1Pro (reported by users)
✓ Lenovo LP6 (reported by users)
Important note: models reported by users are not ufficially confirmed.

☆ Important Notes ☆
To read battery status of pods after the installation of this app: place pods inside case, open TWTools and open pods case. Battery level appear on screen.
To work properly, TWTools needs to disable system battery optimization for it, let it to run in background.

☆ Samsung Users ☆
With OneUI on Samsung, TWTools needs to be added to whitelist of not suspended apps to work correctly. TWTools don't do it automatically.

☆ Android 12 Users ☆
On Android 12 TWTools doesn't need location permission to scan devices but you have to grant new Bluetooth permission.

☆ Translation ☆
Do you want TWTools in your language? Help me to translate it! Contact me at twtools@matteocappello.com

☆ Permissions ☆
✓ BLUETOOTH to scan devices and get battery levels.
✓ GPS to scan BL LOW ENERGY devices and use Bluetooth functions (Android 11 and below policy).
✓ SYSTEM ALERT WINDOW to show popup window over the screen.
Important note: on Android 10+ you have to grant ALWAYS background location permission to let TWTools check when pods are connected and show notification.
